titleStmt.title: A broad-side for the Dutch, with a bounce, a bounce, bounce. to the tune of O hone, O hone: or, the great boobie.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. C[ottrell]. for Samuel Speed,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Twas lately we met with the vapouring Dutch,".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
